game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by a terrible curse that causes crops to wither and die.
game.ending: The hero, with the help of their allies, defeats the dark sorcerer and shatters the curse, restoring magic to the world.
game.synopsis: Eryndor Thorne, a young apprentice blacksmith, sets out on a perilous journey to uncover the source of the curse that has devastated his village. Along the way, he meets a group of unlikely allies, including a skilled warrior and a mysterious mage. Together, they brave treacherous landscapes and battle fearsome enemies in their quest to save their world from destruction.
game.title: Shadows of Eridoria
